title: Riverside Sydney Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Venture west to Sydney’s 'second CBD' and discover a world of diverse cuisine, rolling green spaces, rich history and ‘Eat Street’ coffee with a stay at Novotel Sydney Parramatta. Home to the Parramatta Eels rugby team, this sports-mad city boasts an array of outdoor attractions and seasonal events that would convince the most loyal Sydney-siders to seek a staycation in the best side - the west side. Hire a bike and soak up your surrounds on two wheels, unwind in the hotel's outdoor pool and steam room or take a short stroll along the river trail to explore historic sights including the Old Government House.

title: Stylish Parramatta CBD Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
description:
Discover the cosmopolitan charm of Sydney's western suburbs with a stay at this centrally located residence. This contemporary retreat is perfectly positioned for exploring Parramatta's vibrant dining scene, with Church Street's 'Eat Street' just a short stroll away, and featuring the onsite Social House Dining and Bar.

Delve into the city's rich history at the nearby Old Government House or wander through the tranquil Parramatta Park. At the hotel, enjoy a refreshing dip in the pool, work up a sweat in the fitness centre, or laze back in the outdoor spa. A convenient stop for business and leisure travellers.
offer_address: Corner Parkes Street and Valentine Avenue, Parramatta, New South Wales 2150, Australia

title: Sydney Riverside Suburban Escape in Parramatta with Onsite Dining, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Venture west to Sydney’s 'second CBD' and discover a world of diverse cuisine, rolling green spaces, rich history and ‘Eat Street’ coffee with a stay at Novotel Sydney Parramatta.

Home to the Parramatta Eels rugby team, this sports-mad city boasts an array of outdoor attractions and seasonal events that would convince the most loyal Sydney-siders to seek a staycation in the best side - the west side.

Hire a bike and soak up your surroundings on two wheels, unwind in the hotel's outdoor pool and steam room or take a short stroll along the river trail to explore historic sights including the Old Government House.
offer_address: 350 Church Street, Parramatta, New South Wales 2150, Australia

title: Modern Parramatta Stay with Sweeping City Views, Restaurants & Pool
description: Enjoy the finest of Sydney’s west with a comfortable stay at the vibrant PARKROYAL Parramatta. Boasting sweeping views of the calming Parramatta River and walking distance from the Church Street - also known as 'Eat Street' - you'll be spoilt for choice when it comes to gastronomic adventures. Only 30 minutes from the Sydney CBD, famous tourist sites like the Sydney Harbour Bridge and Opera House are within reach.

title: Stylish Parramatta Stay with Modern In-House Restaurant, Heated Pool and Spa
description: Treat yourself to a home away from home feel with a comfortable stay at the Holiday Inn Parramatta, an IHG Hotel. Just a short walk from the action of the city, the hotel also offers an array of relaxing spaces and in-house exciting activities. Indulge in an acclaimed modern Australian dining experience at the hotel’s own restaurant, Twenty-One Fifty, relax with a cocktail in hand at the Lobby Bar after a long day of travelling or rejuvenate in the heated pool or spa.
location_description: Holiday Inn Parramatta, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 18-40 Anderson Street, Parramatta 2150, New South Wales, Australia
